Description: Flint tool/implement, pointed, with large rough flaking, cortext remaining.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (p. 13; pl. 27.13)
Exhibition history: 2019-2023, Oxford, Ashmolean Museum of Art & Archaeology, Loan for study: prehistoric Egyptian (Badrian) lithic artefacts
